Introduction

Welcome to Genedu! We are committed to protecting the privacy of our users and respecting the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when using the Genedu mobile application ("Genedu" or "App"). By using Genedu, you agree to the collection and use of your information as outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use Genedu.


Information We Collect

1. Information Provided by Users: We may collect personal information you provide when creating a user account, such as name, email address, and other contact information.
2. Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use Genedu, including your activities within the app, time and duration of usage, and interaction with specific features.
3. Device Information: We may collect information about your device, including device type, operating system, network information, and unique device identifiers.


Use of Information

1. Information Usage: We use the information collected to provide, operate, and improve Genedu, including personalizing the user experience, managing user accounts, and delivering relevant content.
2. Communication: We may use the contact information you provide to send updates, notifications, and other information related to Genedu.
3. Analytics: We may use the collected information to analyze usage trends, identify technical issues, and conduct research for app development and improvement purposes.


Sharing of Information

We do not share your personal information with third parties except under the following circumstances:

1. Consent: With your consent to share specific information.
2. Trusted Third Parties: With trusted third parties who provide services on our behalf, as outlined in this Privacy Policy.
3. Legal Compliance: If required by law or a valid legal process.


Information Security

We take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of data transmission or storage is entirely secure.


Your Rights

You have the right to access, update, and delete your personal information that we store. You may also choose to opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us by contacting us directly.


Changes to Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time without prior notice. We will notify you of material changes through notifications in the app or via the contact information you provide.


Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at andregt.project@gmail.com.


Thank you for using Genedu!
Create Your Account, Enjoy Our Features!

Introduction

Welcome to Genedu! These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of the Genedu mobile application ("Genedu" or "App"), so please read them carefully before using our services. By accessing or using Genedu, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use Genedu.


Acceptance of Terms

By downloading, accessing, or using Genedu, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy. These Terms of Use constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Genedu.


Use of Genedu

Genedu is intended for personal, non-commercial use by students to assist in organizing and managing their study routines. You agree to use Genedu only for lawful purposes and in a manner consistent with these Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations.


User Accounts

To access certain features of Genedu, you may be required to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.


Content

Genedu may allow you to upload, submit, store, send, or receive content, including but not limited to text, images, videos, and other materials ("User Content"). You retain ownership of any intellectual property rights that you hold in your User Content. By uploading, submitting, storing, sending, or receiving User Content through Genedu, you grant Genedu a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sublicensable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, perform, and display such User Content in connection with operating and providing Genedu.


Prohibited Conduct

You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:

1. Violating any applicable law or regulation.
2. Interfering with or disrupting the operation of Genedu or any servers or networks connected to Genedu.
3. Impersonating any person or entity or falsely stating or otherwise misrepresenting your affiliation with a person or entity.
4. Uploading, submitting, storing, sending, or receiving any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable.


Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to Genedu at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice. Upon termination, your right to access or use Genedu will immediately cease.


Modifications

We may revise these Terms of Use from time to time without prior notice. By continuing to access or use Genedu after we have posted a revised version of these Terms of Use, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.


Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Use, please contact us at andregt.project@gmail.com.

Overwhelmed with tasks, messy schedule, and chaotic studying? You\'re not alone!
Organize your schedule, manage tasks, and track progress effortlessly.
Genedu is here to help you regain control of your study system!
